title: Bug 4971: Unexpected behavior when copying package
description: Bug 4971: When selecting xxx as the destination for the 'Copy Package' action in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui package of jdt.ui3, the resulting package in xx is named 'ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
OB: Currently, the package 'ui' is created in the destination folder.
EB: The expected behavior is that a package named 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' should be created in the destination folder.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the jdt.ui3 project in Eclipse.
2. Navigate to the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui package.
3. Right-click on the package and select 'Copy'.
4. Paste the package in the destination folder, selecting xxx as the destination.
